attributes.action: Replace Collective Worship with Daily Open Forums in Schools
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Collective worship is out-of-date and is designed to mould the next generation to the wishes of earlier generations.  The modern world requires empowered individuals who know how to work together for the common good despite differences of belief.  Daily open forums are the way forward.  These are already used in some proressive private schools.
